医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
吸入器中的透明胶囊可改善慢性气道疾病的药物输送这项研究检验了患有不可逆慢性气道疾病的患者在单剂量干粉吸入器中使用透明胶囊是否会影响输送的药物量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Transparent-capsules-in-inhalers-improve-medication-delivery-for-chronic-airway-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Transparent-capsules-in-inhalers-improve-medication-delivery-for-chronic-airway-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35285c78-61c6-44f1-a5cd-39da3b6f7842 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 22:45:30 -0400 Transparent capsules in inhalers improve medication delivery for chronic airway diseases
远程监测计划可改善服务不足的患者的血压控制服务不足的社区患高血压不受控制的风险更高，这可能导致心脏病和更高的死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Remote-monitoring-program-improves-blood-Pressure-control-in-underserved-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Remote-monitoring-program-improves-blood-Pressure-control-in-underserved-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c77c012d-be85-47a0-ba33-01c83f323fb6 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 22:38:34 -0400 Remote monitoring program improves blood pressure control in underserved patients
研究显示，每天只需一颗鸡蛋即可减少美国青少年的营养缺口超过 60% 的美国青少年面临营养不足的风险，但每天仅添加一颗鸡蛋就可以提高他们对关键营养素的摄入量，尤其是对于食物不安全的青少年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Just-one-egg-daily-reduces- Nutrition-gaps-among-US-adolescents-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Just-one-egg-daily-reduces- Nutrition-gaps-among-US-adolescents-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ba45acb-e8cb-421a-b784-9f36a5708afd Mon, 23 Sep 2024 22:38:00 -0400 Just one egg daily reduces nutrient gaps among U.S. adolescents, study shows
新模型识别临床试验期间急诊就诊的高风险癌症患者SWOG 癌症研究网络的研究人员开发并验证了一种风险预测模型，用于识别哪些参加临床试验的晚期癌症患者意外急诊 (ER) 就诊和住院的风险最高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/New-model-identizes-cancer- Patients-at-high-risk-for-ER-visits-during-clinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/New-model-identizes-cancer-病人-at-high-risk-for-ER-visits-during-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2aa65b4-6fa3-4f5d-b084-33d6b1834327 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 22:35:29 -0400 New model identifies cancer patients at high risk for ER visits during clinical trials
研究显示患者对长期新冠肺炎的期望与护理之间存在脱节“长新冠病毒”是指初次感染 SARS-CoV-2 三个月后新症状的持续或出现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Research-reveals-a-disconnect- Between- Patient-expectations-and-care-for-long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Research-reveals-a-disconnect- Between- Patient-expectations-and-care-for-long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4be002b1-731f-4882-b4c3-49be2b2cdc61 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 22:29:48 -0400 Research reveals a disconnect between patient expectations and care for long COVID
器官移植后儿童食物过敏的关键诱因研究回顾了移植获得性食物过敏，重点关注儿科患者，特别是肝移植受者。它探讨了免疫系统功能障碍、免疫抑制剂和肠道微生物群的变化是器官移植后食物过敏增加的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Key-triggers-for-food-allergies-in-children-after-organ-transplants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Key-triggers-for-food-allergies-in-children-after-organ-transplants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1549dee5-2ce3-45ae-b457-e0cd7fab17ac Mon, 23 Sep 2024 22:14:00 -0400 Key triggers for food allergies in children after organ transplants
研究评估诊断急性冠状动脉综合征的风险分层工具胸痛是一种常见但对全科医生评估具有挑战性的症状，因为它可能是由严重的病症和更良性的问题引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Study-evaluates-risk-stratification-tools-for-diagnosing-acute-coronary-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Study-evaluates-risk-stratification-tools-for-diagnosing-acute-coronary-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29ddf97b-6b4b-4f07-9c35-d046a91d20c5 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 21:45:11 -0400 Study evaluates risk stratification tools for diagnosing acute coronary syndrome
研究揭示了男性和女性大脑处理威胁方式的关键差异一项新的研究发现，雄性和雌性小鼠在处理威胁的方式上存在显着差异，即使它们表现出相似的行为反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Study-reveals-key-differences-in-how-male-and-female-brains-process-threats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Study-reveals-key-differences-in-how-male-and-female-brains-process-threats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2004ae2a-9461-4e9a-903a-55c72c020d57 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 21:39:21 -0400 Study reveals key differences in how male and female brains process threats
研究人员开发了手术室客观疼痛测量工具手术患者的潜意识疼痛处理或“伤害感受”由麻醉师正确管理的程度将直接影响他们将经历的术后药物副作用的程度以及他们需要进一步疼痛管理的需要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Researchers-develop-tools-for-objective-pain-measurement-in-the-operating-room.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Researchers-develop-tools-for-objective-pain-measurement-in-the-operating-room.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65febb21-c4a0-4076-932b-d09f5bc17058 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 21:18:46 -0400 Researchers develop tools for objective pain measurement in the operating room
突破性研究揭示褪黑激素受体在快速眼动睡眠中的关键作用对睡眠机制理解的重大突破为治疗睡眠障碍和相关神经精神疾病带来了新希望：科学家已确定褪黑激素受体 MT1 是 REM（快速眼动）睡眠的关键调节因子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Breakthrough-research-reveals-key-role-of-melatonin-receptor-in-REM-sleep.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Breakthrough-research-reveals-key-role-of-melatonin-receptor-in-REM-sleep.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3d2fa77-2644-4e54-a018-2629603dd310 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 21:11:55 -0400 Breakthrough research reveals key role of melatonin receptor in REM sleep
